title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Pre-requisites: EC61101Planar isotropic waveguide theory : guided and radiation modes, strip waveguides, anisotropic waveguides, end fibre, beam and waveguide couplers in semiconductors, electro-optic, acousto-optic modulators
